website_summaries.verdict: Carries a desirable price point for a high-powered charger, while also delivering a lightweight case that’s made for portability.
pros: Will deliver fast charging with 15 amps available
Ships with a carrying handle for convenience
Includes indicator lights that simplify operation
Contains an automatic shutoff feature to prevent overcharging
cons: Only has a D-style plug that’s made for EZ-GO TXT golf cart battery systems

customer_reviews.title: Charges My EZ Go Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the battery charger for my modified 2005 EZ Go TXT golf cart. The old charger was probably 20 years old and weighed a ton. Took a few days to get this replacement, but I'm satisfied with the wait since this is a much, much lighter unit and easier to move around my garage. Charged the cart in a couple of hours, so now we're back on the neighborhood roads. Hope this lasts as long as the old charger.
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement charger for my EZ-GO.
customer_reviews.text: What I love is that it charges three times as fast as my old less-expensive replacement charger, and is completely automatic. It is built like a tank and is quiet, even with the fan running. It gives good status info through it's single multi-colored led. Works as advertised and I couldn't be happier. P.S. (Don't attach to nipples. Not even as a joke.)
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mcneely

customer_reviews.title: Mine Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly, yes even a day early. Plugged it into my 36 v EZGO which already had an 80% charge left. After 8 hours of having this device plugged in, a FULL CHARGE light should have come on fairly quickly but it did not. It remained flashing red, low charge for the entire 8 hours and never went to green. So my unit is either defective or incredibly slow. I cannot give it more than 1 star like all of the other reviewers. I really wanted to love it...I needed it badly as my older charger recently died. Sadly, I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M

customer_reviews.title: Save you money and buy an OEM replacement
customer_reviews.text: Had new batteries installed one year ago, then OEM charger died (15 years of service). Golf course was closed for several months, batteries got too low while attached to my 36 volt cart.This unit will not bring up a full charge. Unit caused batteries to boil water out exposing plates. Hope no batteries died. I will need to borrow an OEM charger to get pack to a full charge. Don’t cut corners and buy this unit, replace OEM charger with compatible quality unit for the extra costs and confidence when you take your cart out it will run an entire round!!
customer_reviews.author: DrDon

customer_reviews.title: Good value, love the light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Received 1 day early. Used it right away and so far everything is perfect. No documentation included, but instructions are printed on the unit. I’m 76 yo with a bad back, so the low weight is much appreciated. Update after 2 months, still working great. I mounted it on my cart since it is so light, very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Reid Warren Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Was a little concerned given the price. I figured it must have some shortcomings. Happy to say I am very impressed this far. Charges our cart perfectly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: gstexas

customer_reviews.title: lightweight not much space needed
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for three weeks then just died always hav a problem with connecting had to adjust the connection a little down for almost three weeks worked great yesterday it just stopped chargiong
customer_reviews.author: John M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Unsure how I feel
customer_reviews.text: So I plugged it in as soon as I got it. Little worried that this charger will do like my last after market charger and just keep running. I have had a different one do the same as this and it ruined my batteries due to it never shutting itself off. We will see. So far not very happy
customer_reviews.author: jeff ellis

customer_reviews.title: Charger does not charge.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in, then attached it to the golf cart and left if overnight. The next morning the cart was not charged. I unplugged it for an hour, then plugged it up again. Still no charge. I checked the eletricity and it was good. On the charger, the light was blinking red and green.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Salter

customer_reviews.title: My third EZ-GO charger
customer_reviews.text: My third EZ-GO charger and the best so far. Like the fact that there is no switches, just plug it in and it works, everything else is auto. The lights flash to tell you various things, but other than that, nothing to monkey with or to break. It's also the lightest weight of any of the chargers. This one is just about the size of a brick and is very light weight. It's also the least expensive of the three. So, I hope it lasts, as I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: sporting road

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great and charges our cart perfectly. Highly recommend this charger and was delivered when Amazon said it would. very happy with this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Adams

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and they Resolved the problem
customer_reviews.text: This product worked good for about 4 months. Now it will not work/ charge. I’m trying to contact seller and see what my options are for the 18 month warranty. Will update this upon finding it out and how easy it goes..// Contacted via the Number on the seller page. Very nice lady took my info and resolved the problem. Great customer service. Will shop there again for my golf cart needs
customer_reviews.author: Bangum

customer_reviews.title: This charger is a much better replacement than my original one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger! If it keeps working in the future like it's working now this was money well spent. Lightweight, and I love that it has different colored lights that show you what stage it's charging at. Red. yellow, green. It also shuts down when charging is done. Supposedly you can leave it plugged in to the golf cart at all times, but I'm almost afraid to try that as the batteries are new and I don't want to push my luck. But so far so good and I highly recommend this charger. Delivery was fast and the charger well packed. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: songslady

customer_reviews.title: Compact and  Powerful Charger
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works quietly and efficiently. Light and compact. The future of golf battery chargers is here. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: zreview

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & does what it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace the PowerWise charger that I had for my EZGO golf cart. This product is much lighter and works exactly how it is suppose to. When I first went to plug it into my golf cart the plug would not plug in, I did have to push on the pins a little bit inside the plug so that they would be flexible enough to plug into the cart. Since that first experience there has been no problem at all plugging it in. It charges just like it is suppose to. I read that the company will be putting two extra feet of cord on the charger which will be a nice improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Well Built heavy Construction Simple Instructions on the Case.
customer_reviews.text: I use the charger for my ezgo golf cart. This charger is built on a rugged frame. It has a strong case and carry handle and nice finish. The cables are heavy duty and are firmly connected to the plugs and the charger. This charger has a fan with a grill over it but care should be taken to allow good ventilation. I've been using this charger for 2 months now and am totally satisfied with its operation. All that is left is to see how it holds up after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: 15 amp takes to long to charge
customer_reviews.text: received this charger plugged it in to golf cart red light blinked for over 12 hrs battery very hot light did not turn green for full charge this is unacceptable to take that long and over heat batters I rate this charger as junk dont waste time or money on this charger
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this charger save yourself at least $100
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and saved a lot of money compared to other brands small lightweight but lack nothing when charging
customer_reviews.author: samantha dudley

customer_reviews.title: So thankful I found this!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight battery charger that is half the price of my old one! Love!! I have a 36v golf cart, that has honestly ran better with a charge from this charger than the one the cart came with (that my mother accidentally ran over 🤦‍♀️!
customer_reviews.author: Mandola Washington

customer_reviews.title: Fast charge for half the price of regular chargers.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, considering most of the old heavy golf cart chargers are closer to $400. I have been pleasantly surprised with the charge times so far for the size and weight of the charger. I am still waiting to see how well the maintenance trickle charge actually works, but since my cart is used almost daily I really won't find that out until next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Humble

customer_reviews.title: Tuff and compact
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday to charge our Kingair start cart in our skydiving operation.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for probably two months now works great fantastic its way lighter than the boat anchor that came with the golf cart which eventually died this thing does exactly what it's supposed to do highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bonzai'

customer_reviews.title: Charged up nearly dead batteries in less than overnight,
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much but it is small and compact with a LED light system for charging rate and battery check. It has done well so far. It appears to be well made and is easy to connect just like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: A great charger.
customer_reviews.text: First one i received would not charge above 80%, i sent it back ordered another one, arrived very quickly, it works great. they stood behind the product. The charger is well made, lightweight and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: old sarge

customer_reviews.title: Great but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I would like to see the status light in the front panel. Also maybe a row of lights which shows status. I have difficulty telling the status by a single color changing light.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy (Lee) McDowell

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Charger worked great for two months, then just stopped working. Out of the return/exchange window for Amazon, called company it came from and they said I could only go through Amazon. Learned a hard lesson to not buy anything on Amazon that you expect to last longer than their return window. So, for this product I give a bad review for not lasting longer than 2 months, and for Amazon I am disappointed that I have no recourse for a defective product. Both get a thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Biggane

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and is lightweight compared to the one we got with our EZ Go TXT many years ago. It shuts off when charging is complete and has great colored indicator lights to let us know what’s going on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old EZGO charger finally gave out. This one is smaller, lighter, and quiet. So far (only had it a few weeks) it's worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: lowcountryreader

customer_reviews.title: Used product in box
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I am unhappy about is it came and box was clearly opened and packaging and item clearly shows signs that it was returned and had been used at some point. Seems to be working will find out in a couple hours if the automatic shutdown works as stated. And it states it has an 18 month warranty but no way to register it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement charger
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing a very nice job on my 36 volt cart. I wish it came with a changeable link so it could clamp direct to the battery bank and also that would allow a person to buy different plugs for different cart configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great little charger so far.
customer_reviews.text: I replace my old golf cart charger with this charger. Instead of lugging around a 30# + charger, this one only weighs 7 pounds. Seems to work great although I've only used it once. Directions a little weak - didn't realize that the charging gauge was on the side until I looked on the website. Easy once I realized where the gauge was.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and looks nicely built. Only used it once, so far, but seems to be a good choice over the heavy old one I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: this charger is about 30 pounds lighter then my old one. It has led lights to indicate charging instead of the meter but I didn't pay much attention to the meter. I use it to charge my golf cart and I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph platek

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I opened the box. It was so light weight and small. This charger works great! It takes a little longer to charge. The price makes this a great value.
customer_reviews.author: carguy65

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great I only had this product for one week and it is doing a great job .
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is awesome. It is light, small, easy to transport. You can see from the light, what the current state of charge is. I'm excited about the charger, I can only make a purchase recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Jens  Lunow

customer_reviews.title: Lite  Weight
customer_reviews.text: I Like it ....Works great , I havent had mine but couple months but works great on my 1999 Club Car .
customer_reviews.author: david rucker

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger!
customer_reviews.text: Small and light weight, but does the job of my old clunker. Easy to see lights (green, yellow and red) let you know it's status. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for charging my batteries on my electric golf cart. Works great and the lighting showing full charge, 80% charge or the need to recharge longer is a great feature. Automatic shut off when full charge is completed is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight charger
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This is so much lighter than the old ones, plus smaller and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiej

customer_reviews.title: Valued replacement for original EZGO charger
customer_reviews.text: Lost original golf cart due to electrical storm. Replaced original charger Max36 because of it's value and size.
customer_reviews.author: James Ekleberry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good product , easy to use and handle also easy to tell how charged batteries are.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Solid state and a fraction of the weight of the original charger. Really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This charger met all my expectations. I had tried other chargers with no success. Works just as explained in the write up. This charger is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Compact design!
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great for an over night charge and light weight, not heavy and bulky like my other
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three G.R.I.T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. I install these on carts and love them both 36v and 48v models.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald & Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and the weight of it. Much lighter than the one that came with our cart!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. So much better than the old large and heavy one. I have a 36 volt exhort golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: wetwillykm

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this charger the past 6 months. It does give a complete topping charge on my EZGO! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Guys don't try and save money and cut corners on Chargers. In the long run you will end up spending more money than you would have originally on this product. Straight from the delivery box to use and as well as it performs it is an even better looking product. If/when I ever need another charger I will be buying the same exact one.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: the prompt service
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything, neat little system, and light. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Grover D. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price. Very light weight, beats the 50 pound one I had. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: GLENDA BLACKBURN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item. Deserves all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Great little item. Works just as described. $150 cheaper than the original 50 lb charger.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is a little slow but charges my 36 volt golf cart. Haven't had it long and used it only once. It works
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: excellent charger - low price impressive
customer_reviews.text: after many years of use, it was time to replace our golf cart charger. We had paid a lo of money for that one, and thought we'd try this one for about half the price. It is light weight and does the job exactly the way it is supposed to. We are very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Really love this charger. Lightweight and you can barely hear it. Charges quickly and doesn't get hot like my original one Wouldn't buy any other one.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: If you need one get it soon VERY GOOD PRODUCT - 36 VOLT CHARGER

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a little slow

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and weather proof
customer_reviews.text: Charges at a good rate and so easy to handle

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: This product is of high quality. Good construction and functionality. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Its lite and charges just has good has my old 18 amp charger

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade to the old charger!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger.

customer_reviews.title: Works

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of use and seems high quality. Plug in and it does the work for you. Unplug and drive away. Small enough I mounted it under seat and hard wired it. Now just plug in the cord after use.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a golf cart, buy this
customer_reviews.text: So far excellent. It functioned fantastically getting my batteries to full charge. Love the light weight. So much lighter than the OEM chargers at a much better price.

customer_reviews.title: Plug & Play
customer_reviews.text: The charger is very lightweight and has a built in trickle charger. It takes a bit longer to charge with 15 amps but well worth the money. I had an old Powerwise charger that I replaced that was 18 amps but weighed a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Simple color scheme to determine charging status
customer_reviews.text: Indicator light changes colors as charging progresses and is easy to read. Like the fan. Previous charger I had was only air cooled. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Van Ryn

customer_reviews.title: I have found this charger performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this MODZ max36 15amp ezgo txt battery charger for my friend and she loves it! She reports it is very light weight,quiet and easy to use. Best I can tell it performs as advertised, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lyerla

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Used to charge golf cart batteries. Liked the smart charge feature - turns off when batteries are charged (former charger had to be disconnected manually). Price was good for quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Nice light unit
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to use. Fan can be a little noisy but it’s ok in garage

customer_reviews.title: Works well, so far!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the charger is light weight and affordable. Easy to follow instructions. Lets you know when its charging and when its finished.

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing.

product_meta.title: MODZ Max36 15 AMP EZGO TXT Battery Charger for 36 Volt Golf Carts
feature_bullets: [36-VOLT 15 AMP EZGO TXT GOLF CART BATTERY CHARGER] - Includes a "D" Style Powerwise plug for quick and easy charging of all 36 Volt EZGO TXT golf carts.

[WATER & DUST RESISTANT] - Features an IP67 weather resistance rating, the same rating found on some of today's most advanced smart phones, making it practically impervious to water, dust and vibration damage.

[PLUG & FORGET TECHNOLOGY] - Engineered with innovative, soft switch technology allowing you to plug in your golf cart and leave it plugged-in without fear of damaging or draining your batteries, a common issue with many golf cart battery chargers.

[LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN, CONVENIENT CARRY HANDLE & 16' OF TOTAL CABLE LENGTH] - Designed with convenience in mind, the MODZ Max48 weighs in at only 7 lbs and is more than 50% lighter than most OEM and aftermarket golf cart battery chargers, but don’t let the weight fool you. The MODZ Max48 battery charger is constructed with a durable die-cast aluminum alloy casing providing exceptional durability. The Max also features both 8' AC and DC cables allowing you to plug in your golf cart up to 16' away.

[BUY WITH CONFIDENCE] - Built by one of the largest and most advanced battery charger manufacturers in the world, tough tested under the most extreme conditions and exclusively sold by one of the most well-known, reputable golf cart parts and accessories retailers with over a decades of industry experience.
